short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Play Pixel Miner is a fun puzzle game with micraft images and dramatic tnt explosive features right on the chrome extension

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Play Pixel Miner is a fun puzzle game with micraft images and dramatic tnt explosive features right on the chrome extension. By clicking on the space bar to start the game, arrange the puzzle so that there are no holes left below and a single hole in the middle of the horizontal row, to fit into that hole will explode and drop down one or more rows.
